en_text: 2x ATK additional damage when matching orbs

jp_skill.name: キングのかみつき
jp_skill.raw_description: ドロップを消した時、攻撃力×2倍の追い打ち。

kr_skill.name: 왕의 물어뜯기
kr_skill.raw_description: 드롭을 지운 턴에서 공격력x2배의 추가 공격

na_skill.name: King's Bite
na_skill.raw_description: Inflicts a bonus attack equal to 2x ATK when matching Orbs
